title: Enhancing Healthcare Practice Competencies: Analyzing Factors Influencing Educational Outcomes: Technology vs. Human Factors

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can comparatively analyze technological and human factors influencing teacher clarity, perceived course value, and student learning outcomes.
Learners can improve class participation rates by over 20% using nonverbal communication (NVC) techniques.
Learners can explain the priority of teacher expertise and communication skills over technological tools in educational outcomes.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
